data.text:
Snatch is a Quest in Escape from Tarkov.

Dialogue[]

You're here, good. Now listen carefully. My men went to the meeting place, their job was to replace the folder these snakes were so diligently preparing with the one I had arranged, but it's already been several hours since my group stopped responding. The last time they contacted me, they reported seeing a group of Rogues. Knight and his men are not aware of this operation, perhaps one of them interfered with the delivery. The first thing you must do is to check the Rogues' base and find the lost data, but don't go to them right away, or they'll figure out I'm involved and will start asking questions. Then you'll have to deliver it to the federal reserve base, a meeting place has been set up at the machinery and equipment repair center. Find that folder and leave at the base, and bring the real one to me. It's crucial to deliver this information to me. It's time to find out who these suicidal moles are.

Requirements[]

Unlocks 10 hours after completion of Missing Informant

Objectives[]

Extract from Lighthouse

Obtain the forged intelligence at the Rogue base on Lighthouse

Obtain the original intelligence in the repair station on Reserve

Stash the forged intelligence under the BMP-2 in place of the original

Bring the original intelligence to Lightkeeper

Rewards[]

Lightkeeper Rep +0.01

3Ã— VPX Flash Storage Module

Unlocks craft for UHF RFID Reader at Intelligence Center level 2

Unlocks purchase of Death Shadow lightweight armored mask at Ragman LL4

Unlocks the Lightkeeper service "Sacred Amulet"

Welcome back. Now, let's see what they're up to.

Guide[]

Related Quest Items Icon Item name Amount Requirement Find in raid Notes Forged Lightkeeper intelligence 1 Pickup* and placement item Yes This quest item can only be found if the quest is active.

When picked up, this item is transferred to the player's quest item inventory.

If the player fails to extract with this item, they will lose it. Lightkeeper intelligence 1 Pickup and handover item Yes This quest item can only be found if the quest is active.

When picked up, this item is transferred to the player's quest item inventory.

If the player fails to extract with this item, they will lose it. RB-ST key 1 Required N/A Unlocks the RB-ST room on Reserve where the BMP-2 is located.

*This item will only appear in your next Lighthouse raid after accepting this quest.

In this quest you have to obtain the forged intelligence on Lighthouse and exchange it with the original intelligence on Reserve. Afterwards you have to bring the original intelligence to Lightkeeper.

Forged intelligence locations on Lighthouse[]

The forged intelligence can be found in either a green or blue container near the western entrance of the water treatment plant.

Containers marked on map

The green container

Inside the green container

Forged intelligence between the weapon box and the barrels

The blue container

Inside the blue container, forged intelligence on the couch

Original intelligence and exchange spot location on Reserve[]

The original intelligence can be found tucked in the right side tracks of a BMP-2 which is located in the RB-ST room at the repair station on Reserve. The RB-ST key is required to enter it. The forged intelligence has to be placed at the back of the BMP-2.
